comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: Mis-captioned. This is a photo of Frederick Mears (b. 1878 - d. 1939), former superintendant of the Panama Railroad and Steam Ship Company, appointed to the Alaska Engineering Commission in April 1914. He is credited as the builder of the Alaska Railroad. See: www.alaskarails.org/people/mears.html

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: TVL1970: And thanks once again for catching this accidental swap of caption information. We will untangle the two images, and apply the proper caption to this photo of Lt. Mears and to the photo of Belloc.
